episodes.title: Episode 34: The Hillsong Scandals | A Mega Church’s Fall From Grace
episodes.description: Over the years Hillsong grew to be one of the most beloved churches across the world. Their popularity helped them skyrocket into the Mega Church sphere. Even if you didn't attend a Hillsong church you most likely heard their worship songs at your own Sunday morning church service. But just like many other churches they had their own skeletons they were trying to hide away from the world. So, come with us as we dive down the rabbit hole that is Hillsong and all their scandals. episodes.title: Episode 4: Josh Duggar | The 'Godly' Predator
episodes.description: In this episode we go through the life and lies of Josh Duggar. Josh is the son and oldest child of Jim Bob and Michelle Duggar and a reality TV star from TLC's show 17 Kids and Counting. Just like many other well known "christian" families they tried to bury their family secrets but journalists, hackers, and investigators wouldn't let that happen. Buckle up heathens because Josh Duggar is a disgusting predator and this episode can be hard to listen to at times.
